statement: Location pages help Google understand service-area context for local businesses
source_quotes: Creating a location-specific page on your website is one of the most concrete ways to build context with Google.

statement: Local businesses benefit from lower competition when targeting location-specific keywords
source_quotes: The difficulty is going to be lower just by nature of you even doing this at all. You're going to have a major advantage on your competitors.

statement: National companies can benefit from local location pages when targeting specific markets
source_quotes: Even though we're a national company, we went ahead and made some local pages for it.

statement: Including location-specific services in the introduction improves local search rankings
source_quotes: this gives additional context to Google about who you are

statement: Internal linking between location pages and service pages strengthens SEO authority
source_quotes: these pages are in fact important

statement: Google's algorithm recognizes businesses operating in multiple locations through location pages
source_quotes: Google's algorithm... know that he's doing business in all of those locations

statement: Location pages with service + location keywords outperform generic pages in local searches
source_quotes: "Nobody else is even thinking about this kind of stuff..."

statement: Location pages can rank in organic search for specific city-based queries.
source_quotes: Asphalt paving Gilroy. It's number four in the organic search.

statement: Creating multiple location pages is not harmful if menus remain uncluttered.
source_quotes: I just don't see the harm in it. As long as that menu doesn't look all cluttered.

statement: Mentioning local landmarks improves local relevance
source_quotes: mentioning local landmarks... boost your local relevance

statement: Internal linking between location pages improves rankings
Service area pages require 3+ months of optimization to show organic rankings

statement: Google Business profiles outrank organic landing pages in local search
source_quotes: this is 20 centuries profile here this will be your number one marketing tool to Market your services locally

statement: Prioritizing Google Business Profile improves local search visibility

statement: Schema markup for LocalBusiness is a ranking factor for local SEO
source_quotes: "Google has no comment on volatility... but schema is critical."

statement: Local pack ad visibility increased from 6.5% to 22% of keywords between July 2024 and January 2025
